name: GCDualSenseAdaptiveTrigger.Status
desc: The possible states of an adaptive trigger.

items.name: case feedbackNoLoad
items.desc: The trigger is in feedback mode, but isn’t applying the resistive load.

items.name: case feedbackLoadApplied
items.desc: The trigger is in feedback mode and is applying the resistive load.

items.name: case weaponReady
items.desc: The trigger is in weapon mode and ready to fire, but isn’t applying the resistive load.

items.name: case weaponFiring
items.desc: The trigger is in weapon mode, firing, and is applying the resistive load.

items.name: case weaponFired
items.desc: The trigger is in weapon mode, has fired, and has stopped applying the resistive load.

items.name: case vibrationNotVibrating
items.desc: The trigger is in vibration mode, but isn’t vibrating.

items.name: case vibrationIsVibrating
items.desc: The trigger is in vibration mode and is vibrating.
